blogPost.excerpt: Feather is an online platform that empowers creators and instructors to easily manage and monetize their virtual events, on-demand classes, and other digital content.
blogPost.body: Feather is an online platform that empowers creators and instructors to easily manage and monetize their virtual events, on-demand classes, and other digital content.
blogPost.title: Feather - Host Zoom events, sell masterclasses, and build your brand.
blogPost.author: Celilsemi Sam Erkiner

localize.description: Feather是一个在线平台，使创作者和讲师能够轻松地管理他们的虚拟活动、按需课程和其他数字内容，并使之货币化。
localize.tagline: 举办Zoom活动，销售大师班，建立您的品牌。

localize.description: Feather是一個在線平臺，使創作者和講師能夠輕鬆地管理他們的虛擬活動、按需課程和其他數字內容，並使之貨幣化。
localize.tagline: 舉辦Zoom活動，銷售大師班，建立您的品牌。

previous.excerpt: Discover the power of Walling and kickstart your next project with the new Walling templates. No complex workflows. No wasted hours setting up random templates that don't work. With Walling, it is simple, just put it on a wall! Start a new wall: https://wall.new
previous.title: Walling Templates - Plan and organize everything, with zero friction

localize.description: 发现 Walling 的强大功能，并使用新的 Walling 模板启动您的下一个项目。没有复杂的工作流程。不需要浪费大量时间去设置那些无法使用的随机模板。有了 Walling，一切都很简单，只需把它贴在墙上即可! 开始一面新墙：https://wall.new
localize.tagline: 计划和组织一切，零摩擦

localize.description: 發現 Walling 的強大功能，並使用新的 Walling 模板啓動您的下一個項目。沒有複雜的工作流程。不需要浪費大量時間去設置那些無法使用的隨機模板。有了 Walling，一切都很簡單，只需把它貼在牆上即可! 開始一面新牆：https://wall.new

next.excerpt: Compose private notes, optionally share them with others and still stay in control of who can access your data. All while having an excellent offline-first experience on all platforms.
